title: Every Game of ARURF
body:
http://imgur.com/sE3aZmH

A 21/1 LeBlanc bragging about how she got LUCKY enough to get a good champ. This has nothing to do with the person, so don't remove this post. It's just that, when we play ARURF, we're crossing our fingers in the hopes that we're getting someone we want. We're GAMBLING every time we queue up.

replies.body: no name shaming on boards reported
